Package ProjectGameVer3

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assasin  
    AttackMagnet
    Attack Magnet potion which makes the drinker have a greater chance of being attacked(82% chance).
    Beserker  
    Boost
    Boost potion which increases the attack power of the drinker by 5HP.
    Cleric  
    Defender  
    Duelist  
    Encounter  
    Game
    The core class calls all required classes for the game to function.
    Health
    Health potion which makes the drinker healed by 10 HP (It will not exceed Maximum HP).
    Hero  
    InitTeams
    A class to initialize the teams involved in the game.
    Manticore  
    Monk
    The monk by default has a dodge chance of 33%.This is the specialty of the monk.
    Monster  
    Mummy  
    Ogre
    The Class defines a monster Ogre who inherits the same characteristics as a monster.
    Orc
    Orc is a special monster that can double its attack power on knocking out an opponent and get healed.
    Paladin  
    Poison  
    Potions

    Rogue
